sense.def: Illness Sign identical with bai zhuo 白濁①, white turbidity. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu ling 茯苓 quoting Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 Recipe Entry wei xi wan 威喜丸 , pills with wei xi (i.e. fu ling ) ：小便白濁 , “The urine is white-turbid”, writes: 小便下濁 , “ Discharge of turbid urine ”.
